attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0062

Date: 2013-01-31

Whereas vacancies exist in the officer establishment numbers within the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, the maximum of which, in each rank, is prescribed by the Treasury Board pursuant to subsection 6(2) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(c) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act, appoints, by way of promotion, the officers of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police whose names are set out in column 1 in the annexed schedule to the rank set out opposite their name in column 2.


Attendu qu’il existe des vacances au sein de l’effectif des officiers de la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, dont le nombre maximal de chaque grade est fixé par le Conseil du Trésor en vertu du paragraphe 6(2) de la Loi sur la Gendarmerie royale du Canada,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Sécurité publique et de la Protection civile et en vertu de l’alinéa 6(3)c) de la Loi sur la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil nomme, par voie de promotion, les officiers de la Gendarmerie royale du Canada dont le nom figure à la colonne 1 de l’annexe ci-jointe au grade indiqué en regard à la colonne 2.


SCHEDULE

 

ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE ACT

 

 

PROMOTION

 

 

COLUMN 1

COLUMN 2

OFFICER

RANK

Chief Superintendent Janice Rose Armstrong

Assistant Commissioner

Chief Superintendent Craig Steven MacMillan

Assistant Commissioner

Chief Superintendent Joseph Robert Gilles Moreau

Assistant Commissioner

Superintendent Lindsey Gilbert Brine

Chief Superintendent

Inspector Sean Kevin Bourrie

Superintendent

Inspector Paul Bernard Gagnon

Superintendent

 


ANNEXE

 

LOI SUR LA GENDARMERIE ROYALE DU CANADA

 

 

PROMOTION

 

 

COLONNE 1

COLONNE 2

OFFICIER

GRADE

Surintendante principale Janice Rose Armstrong

Commissaire adjointe

Surintendant principal Craig Steven MacMillan

Commissaire adjoint

Surintendant principal Joseph Robert Gilles Moreau

Commissaire adjoint

Surintendante Lindsey Gilbert Brine

Surintendante principale

Inspecteur Sean Kevin Bourrie

Surintendant

Inspecteur Paul Bernard Gagnon

Surintendant

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, pursuant to paragraph 6(3)(c) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act, appoints, by way of promotion, the officers of
